View_Interfaces

Interface IProcessClassificationView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IView, java.util.Observer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessClassificationFReqView, ProcessClassificationNFReqView, ProcessClassificationProdDataView, ProcessClassificationView

    public interface IProcessClassificationView
extends IView
    In this view the user can set the class and edit the data and/or transaction function point parameters of a elementary process for the cost estimation. It changes its appearance depending on the selected class what handles an internal controller. This is why the interface contains functions to get data independent on which class is selected, but they can return null if the belonging class is not selected.

    This view provides two view actions for the user:

    • ViewActions.SAVE - saves the new data for the elementary process
    • ViewActions.CANCEL - cancels the changes
    The controller has to observe these two actions and react on them.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    9045534
